alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:47PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Weld, northeastern Denver and western Adams Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 947 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Barr Lake, or 19 miles northeast of Denver, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Fort Lupton, Lochbuie, Hudson, Keenesburg, Prospect Valley, Barr Lake, Milton Reservoir and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
